title: A Good Day To Die Hard: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Chris Wade and Australian film critic Alice Tynan discuss A Good Day To Die Hard. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
